meanings.definition: Of or relating to a host
meanings.sent1: The hostly duties included greeting guests and making them feel welcome.
meanings.sent2: The hostly behavior of the party organizer was evident in the way she ensured everyone had a good time.
meanings.sent3: The hostly cat welcomed the new kitten with a friendly purr.
meanings.sent4: The hostly atmosphere of the restaurant made diners feel like honored guests.
meanings.sent5: The hostly smile on her face put everyone at ease.

meanings.sent1: His hostly nature shone through as he graciously attended to his guests' needs.

meanings.sent3: The hostly sun welcomed the day with its warm rays.
meanings.sent4: The hostly demeanor of the teacher made students feel comfortable asking questions.
meanings.sent5: The hostly welcome mat at the front door signaled a warm reception.
